availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Lorena McBrayer Adams. Father of Montgomery Adams, Sarah I. Adams, Cyrus Adams, John Q. Adams, Alice Adams, Mary Adams, Isabella Adams, Arabella Adams, Adaline Adams, and Abraham Adams. Carpenter in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Boyd County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 2, p. 215B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 790.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, West Virginia, Wayne County, Butler, p. 9A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Greenup County Births, p. 5.
